title: Blank Worksheets Generator
original_prompt: I want you to act as a fill in the blank worksheets generator for students learning English as a second language. Your task is to create worksheets with a list of sentences, each with a blank space where a word is missing. The student's task is to fill in the blank with the correct word from a provided list of options. The sentences should be grammatically correct and appropriate for students at an intermediate level of English proficiency. Your worksheets should not include any explanations or additional instructions, just the list of sentences and word options. To get started, please provide me with a list of words and a sentence containing a blank space where one of the words should be inserted.
input1: The cat is sitting on the _______ (table, chair, floor).
input2: She enjoys reading _______ in the evening (books, movies, music).
input1_ans:
1. The cat is sitting on the _______ (table, chair, floor).  
2. She enjoys reading a book in the _______ (park, school, office).  
3. They will go to the _______ (beach, mountain, city) this weekend.  
4. He forgot to bring his _______ (homework, lunch, shoes) to school.  
5. The flowers in the garden are very _______ (beautiful, ugly, boring).  
6. I need to buy some _______ (milk, bread, water) for breakfast.  
7. The movie was so _______ (interesting, boring, difficult) that I fell asleep.  
8. We should _______ (leave, stay, go) early to avoid traffic.  
9. My brother plays the _______ (guitar, piano, drums) very well.  
10. She is wearing a _______ (red, blue, green) dress to the party.

The dog is barking at the _______ (mailman, tree, car).  
The sun is shining in the _______ (sky, ground, water).  
She is reading a _______ (book, pencil, table).  
They are playing in the _______ (park, house, car).  
He is eating an _______ (apple, chair, shoe).  
The flowers are blooming in the _______ (garden, sky, table).  
We are going to the _______ (store, chair, book).  
The baby is sleeping in the _______ (crib, table, car).  
She is wearing a _______ (dress, table, shoe).  
The birds are singing in the _______ (tree, floor, chair).
input2_ans:
1. She enjoys reading _______ in the evening. (books, movies, music)  
2. They decided to go _______ for dinner last night. (home, school, work)  
3. He always _______ his homework before dinner. (does, do, doing)  
4. The weather is very _______ today, perfect for a picnic. (cold, hot, nice)  
5. I need to buy some _______ for the party this weekend. (food, homework, books)  
6. She _______ to the gym every morning before work. (go, goes, going)  
7. We will visit the museum _______ Saturday. (on, in, at)  
8. My brother plays the guitar _______ than I do. (better, good, well)  
9. They are planning to travel _______ Europe next summer. (around, through, across)  
10. I have never seen a _______ movie before. (funny, fun, funnier)
She enjoys reading _______ in the evening (books, movies, music).
